entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
